message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product! I'm open to offers, but I'm looking for at least $100 for it. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but I'm only able to go up to $80 right now.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to go down a little, how about $90?  Let me know what you think.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  $90 is still a bit high for me.  I'm really hoping to get it for $85.  Let me know if you're willing to budge a bit more.
